frontmatter.title: Trains and the Buddhist principle of impermanence
frontmatter.description: The Buddhist principle of impermanence, where everything in life is constantly changing, and nothing is permanent. Even something as grand and impressive as a train is also subject to this. Despite this, trains are crucial in connecting people and places, providing transportation essential to our society.
